Welcome to Clipio!

Copy a link from any app to Clipboard.
It will automatically appear here.

Delete old links in a snap to keep your list clean.

Clipio respects your privacy. It collects no data and doesn\'t require you to login.

Launch on startup Launch the service automatically when the device starts Delete recent items Delete will also include items added within the last 24 hours
